name: Bacteria vs. Virus
description:
What is this?

Bacteria vs Virus is a simulation game where player sticks different types of part together to form an unique bacterium. Then just watch it grow, duplicate and survive, while competing with enemy bacteria.

How to play?

Yeah, just click on the tutorial icons inside the game...

Goal of the game?

Build something unique and watch it interact with other bacteria.

(Special thanks to David King, Ricky Haggett and many more for their help)
